item.title: CVE-2023-1462|2024-08-02T05:49:11.675Z -- vadi%20corporate%20information%20systems -- digikent
item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Vadi Corporate Information Systems DigiKent allows Authentication Bypass, Authentication Abuse.Â This issue affects DigiKent: before 23.03.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-1100|2024-08-01T18:26:30.488Z -- vadi%20corporate%20information%20systems -- digikent%20gis
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Vadi Corporate Information Systems DIGIKENT GIS allows SQL Injection.This issue affects DIGIKENT GIS: through 2.23.5.
